title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4621.8 - Control of sale of games of chance currency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4621.8 - Control of sale of games of chance currency

State Regulations

The licensed authorized organization shall maintain
necessary records to effectuate control of the sale of games of chance currency
and proceeds from the conduct of authorized games of chance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4621.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
